   "github_updated_at": "2026-02-07T19:54:38Z",
   "body_snippet": "All,\r\nI'm having issues getting MSSQL connection to work, connects to DB fine but prompts error messages when attempting to create a new Connection or New Folder.\r\n\r\nmRemoteNG version: 1.77.0.41252\r\nSQL: SQL Server 2019\r\n\r\nI receive the following different errors, when I try and tweak the first one, I receive the second one.\r\nErrorMsg\r\n08/19/2020 16:33:50\r\nCouldn't save connections file as \"\"!\r\nCannot insert the value NULL into column 'RedirectAudioCapture', table 'mRemoteNG.dbo.tblCons'; column...",
-  "our_status": "new",
-  "priority": null,
+  "our_status": "triaged",
+  "priority": "P2-bug",
   "target_release": null,
   "our_branch": null,
   "our_pr": null,
-  "iterations": [],
+  "iterations": [
+    {
+      "seq": 1,
+      "date": "2026-02-20",
+      "type": "triaged",
+      "description": "SQL schema upgrade path fails for databases created with older versions, causing NULL constraint violations and column mapping mismatches when saving connections"
+    }
+  ],
   "comments": [
     {
       "id": "MDEyOklzc3VlQ29tbWVudDY4MjU1Mzg5OA==",
@@ -133,5 +140,5 @@
   "needs_action": true,
   "waiting_for_us": false,
   "last_synced": "2026-02-15T09:52:50Z",
-  "notes": ""
+  "notes": "AI triage (claude): SQL schema upgrade path fails for databases created with older versions, causing NULL constraint violations and column mapping mismatches when saving connections\nApproach: Make DataTableSerializer resilient to schema mismatches by validating column existence before mapping, and add a schema-repair step in SqlDatabaseVersionVerifier that detects missing columns and adds them (idempotent ALTER TABLE ADD IF NOT EXISTS pattern) before the save operation proceeds"
 }
